H0.text: Which pop group in October 1974 reached NumberOne in the UK charts with Sad, Sweet Dreamer. The Rubettes

H1.text: Which pop group in October 1974 reached NumberOne in the UK charts with Sad, Sweet Dreamer. Bay City Rollers

H2.text: Which pop group in October 1974 reached NumberOne in the UK charts with Sad, Sweet Dreamer. David Essex

H3.text: Which pop group in October 1974 reached NumberOne in the UK charts with Sad, Sweet Dreamer. SWEET SENSATION

A4.text: The Rubettes' first and biggest hit was 'Sugar Baby Love', which was a number one in the United Kingdom for four weeks in May 1974, while reaching number 37 on the US chart that August, and remains their best-known record.

A5.text: Sad Sweet Dreamer is a song by Sweet Sensation.

A6.text: It was a number-one single on the UK Singles Chart for one week in October 1974.
